data.title: How Eyewitness Testimony Works(?)
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from Stuff You Should Know on Spotify. Few things are more compelling than a witness pointing out a defendant in the courtroom as the perpetrator. But few things are also more unreliable than eyewitness testimony. Our memories can be pretty terrible, which matters when youâ€™re facing death row.
